chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall d : DTA, DTA_main_state_correct d -> DTA_main_state_correct (DTA_kill (dta_states_non_empty d) d)

Premises:
dta_states_non_empty = fun d : DTA => match d with | dta p _ => dta_non_empty_states p end : DTA -> Map bool
DTA_kill = fun (m : Map bool) (d : DTA) => match d with | dta p a => DTA_simpl (dta (preDTA_kill m p) a) end : Map bool -> DTA -> DTA
Inductive DTA : Set := dta : preDTA -> ad -> DTA
DTA_main_state_correct = fun d : DTA => match d with | dta p a => addr_in_preDTA p a end : DTA -> Prop
DTA_kill_ref_ok_invar : forall (d : DTA) (sigma : signature), DTA_ref_ok d -> dta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> DTA_ref_ok (DTA_kill (dta_states_non_empty d) d)
DTA_main_state_correct_check_complete : forall d : DTA, DTA_main_state_correct_check d = true -> DTA_main_state_correct d
DTA_main_state_correct_check_correct : forall d : DTA, DTA_main_state_correct d -> DTA_main_state_correct_check d = true
DTA_kill_empty_states = fun d : DTA => DTA_kill (dta_states_non_empty d) d : DTA -> DTA
DTA_kill_correct_wrt_sign_invar : forall (d : DTA) (m : Map bool) (sigma : signature), dta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> dta_correct_wrt_sign (DTA_kill m d) sigma
preDTA_kill_ref_ok_invar : forall (d : preDTA) (sigma : signature), preDTA_ref_ok d -> predta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> preDTA_ref_ok (preDTA_kill (dta_non_empty_states d) d)
dta_app_ne_def_ok : forall d : preDTA, def_ok_app bool (ensemble_base state d) (dta_app_ne d)
DTA_kill_ref_ok_invar_lazy : forall (d : DTA) (sigma : signature), DTA_ref_ok d -> dta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> DTA_ref_ok (DTA_kill_empty_states_lazy d)
kill_empty_correct_wrt_sign_invar : forall (d : DTA) (sigma : signature), dta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> dta_correct_wrt_sign (DTA_kill_empty_states d) sigma
DTA_kill_empty_states_lazy_correct_wrt_sign_invar : forall (d : DTA) (sigma : signature), dta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> dta_correct_wrt_sign (DTA_kill_empty_states_lazy d) sigma
kill_empty_lazy_correct_wrt_sign_invar : forall (d : DTA) (sigma : signature), dta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> dta_correct_wrt_sign (DTA_kill_empty_states_lazy d) sigma
dta_ref_ok_check_complete : forall d : DTA, dta_ref_ok_check d = true -> DTA_ref_ok d
dta_ref_ok_check_correct : forall d : DTA, DTA_ref_ok d -> dta_ref_ok_check d = true
DTA_kill_empty_states_lazy = fun d : DTA => DTA_kill (dta_states_non_empty_lazy d) d : DTA -> DTA
dt_kill_empty_semantics : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance d a t < -> reconnaissance (preDTA_kill (dta_non_empty_states d) d) a t
dt_non_empty_r_4 : forall (p : prec_list) (n : nat) (d : preDTA) (pl : pl_path), dt_non_empty_r_def_0 n -> pl_path_true pl (power (Map bool) (dta_app_ne d) (map_mini state d) n) -> pl_path_incl pl p -> exists tl : term_list, liste_reconnait d p tl
states_kill_empty.kill_empty_correct_wrt_sign_invar : forall (d : preDTA) (sigma : signature) (m : Map bool), predta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> predta_correct_wrt_sign (preDTA_kill m d) sigma
preDTA_kill_correct_wrt_sign_invar : forall (d : preDTA) (m : Map bool) (sigma : signature), predta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> predta_correct_wrt_sign (preDTA_kill m d) sigma
dta_non_empty_states = fun d : preDTA => power (Map bool) (dta_app_ne d) (map_mini state d) (S (MapCard state d)) : preDTA -> Map bool
dta_non_empty_states_lazy = fun d : preDTA => lazy_power bool eqm_bool (dta_app_ne d) (map_mini state d) (S (MapCard state d)) : preDTA -> Map bool
DTA_rect : forall P : DTA -> Type, (forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad), P (dta p a)) -> forall d : DTA, P d
DTA_ind : forall P : DTA -> Prop, (forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad), P (dta p a)) -> forall d : DTA, P d
DTA_rec : forall P : DTA -> Set, (forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad), P (dta p a)) -> forall d : DTA, P d
dta_states_non_empty_lazy_eg_dta_states_non_empty : forall d : DTA, dta_states_non_empty_lazy d = dta_states_non_empty d
kill_empty_states_lazy_eg_kill_empty_states : forall d : DTA, DTA_kill_empty_states_lazy d = DTA_kill_empty_states d
dta_kill_empty_states_lazy_semantics : forall (d : DTA) (t : term), reconnait d t < -> reconnait (DTA_kill_empty_states_lazy d) t
dta_kill_empty_states_semantics : forall (d : DTA) (t : term), reconnait d t < -> reconnait (DTA_kill_empty_states d) t
dt_non_empty_r_def_0 = fun n : nat => forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad), MapGet bool (power (Map bool) (dta_app_ne d) (map_mini state d) n) a = Some true -> exists t : term, reconnaissance d a t : nat -> Prop Argument scope is [nat_scope]
dt_non_empty_fix : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad), MapGet bool (dta_non_empty_states d) a = Some true < -> (exists t : term, reconnaissance d a t)
dta_compatible_compat : forall d0 d1 : DTA, dta_compatible d0 d1 -> DTA_compat d0 d1
predta_ref_ok_check_complete : forall d : preDTA, predta_ref_ok_check d = true -> preDTA_ref_ok d
predta_ref_ok_check_correct : forall d : preDTA, preDTA_ref_ok d -> predta_ref_ok_check d = true
essence = fun (t : term) (d : preDTA) => S (term_high t) * S (DTA_taille d) : term -> preDTA -> nat
Inductive reconnaissance : preDTA -> ad -> term -> Prop := rec_dta : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> reconnaissance d a t with state_reconnait : preDTA -> state -> term -> Prop := rec_st : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> state_reconnait d s (app c tl) with liste_reconnait : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list -> Prop := rec_empty : forall d : preDTA, liste_reconnait d prec_empty tnil | rec_consi : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a hd ->...-> liste_reconnait d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)
dtas_correct_wrt_sign_compatibles : forall (sigma : signature) (d d' : DTA), dta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> dta_correct_wrt_sign d' sigma -> dta_compatible d d'
predtas_correct_wrt_sign_compatibles : forall (sigma : signature) (d d' : preDTA), predta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> predta_correct_wrt_sign d' sigma -> predta_compatible d d'
rec_dta : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> reconnaissance d a t
predta_compat_check_complete : forall (d : preDTA) (sigma : signature), predta_compat_check d sigma = true -> predta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma
dta_compat_check_complete : forall (d : DTA) (sigma : signature), dta_compat_check d sigma = true -> dta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma
predta_compat_check_correct : forall (d : preDTA) (sigma : signature), predta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> predta_compat_check d sigma = true

``` 
intros d H.
unfold DTA_main_state_correct in *.
unfold DTA_kill in *.
simpl.
unfold DTA_main_state_correct.
unfold DTA_main_state_correct in H.
unfold DTA_main_state_correct.
rewrite H.
reflexivity.
```

original: intros d H. unfold DTA_main_state_correct in *. unfold DTA_kill in *. simpl. unfold DTA_main_state_correct. unfold DTA_main_state_correct in H. unfold DTA_main_state_correct. rewrite H. reflexivity.
